items.content_html: Seek to Remote Lite is a personal project to demonstrate the knowledge and skills to design and implement an interactive web app for users to search, to save and to apply available job positions around the globe. It's aimed to be developed as a lightweight web app to meet functionality and simplicity.

It's aimed to be developed as a lightweight web app to meet functionality and simplicity.
